original_text: And David sent messengers, and took her; and she came in unto him, and he lay with her; for she was purified from her uncleanness: and she returned unto her house.
korean_text: 다윗이 전령을 보내어 그 여자를 자기에게로 데려오게 하고 그 여자가 그 부정함을 깨끗하게 하였으므로 더불어 동침하매 그 여자가 자기 집으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: and she came in unto him
for she was purified from her uncleanness
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그녀가 부정에서 정결하게 되었기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and she returned unto her house
